alert.note: Alert for Jackson Hole; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 03 at 3:54AM MDT until November 05 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow likely. Preliminary total snow accumulations in the mountains of 18 to 24 inches, while 5 to 10 in the lower elevations. Very windy in the mountains could result in whiteout conditions. * WHERE...Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains and Jackson Hole. * WHEN...From Friday evening through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible especially over Teton and Togwotee mountain passes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Backcountry enthusiasts can easily become disoriented and lost. Frostbite and hypothermia can set in quickly.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Jackson Hole; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains
